Enter New Password and Confirm New Password and click Change
Contain at least one small letter
Contain at least one capital letter
Password is changed successfully, you can now login with the new password
Please choose the method you need to receive verification code through then click Send

To restore your forgotten password, please enter your email address, and click Send. An email message containing a link to reset your password will be sent to your email. Please note that this link is valid within one hour

To reset your access data, please enter your username and click “Send”. A message containing verification code will be sent to you, please use that code to reset your access data. Please note that this code is valid within 3 Minutes

An email has been sent to EMAIL_TXT, To reset your password, Please click on the verification link from Bitaqaty via email

For help: You can contact our Resellers support now


If you do not receive the message, you can click resend link
Please enter the Sms Verification Code sent to your account’s mobile number and click Sign in
In case you didn’t receive code press
No application available to view file
This account can purchase any product
Amount will be limited for the account
Account’s balance will be from the Master Account balance with no limit
In case of hiding all prices(product price, VAT amount, and after VAT) will be hidden in all Purchases Cycle, Products List, Reports, and Logs

Transactions log of all the sub-accounts
This account can communicate with our Reseller support through LiveChat, Whatsapp or opening ticket
Allow to View Master Account Balance
You need to enter purchase limit
Are you sure you want to delete this account data?
Bank account and Bitaqaty Business account should have the same owner name
Requests are processed daily within one hour from 8am to 2am KSA time
Sold Vouchers Are Not Replaceable or Refundable
Kindly use Bitaqaty Business Live Chat only which is available now on Bitaqaty Business website.

Ask away… we are here to help! Just fill in the form and we will do our best to get back to you within 24 hours. It might take a bit longer – depending on the question, but we try hard not to keep you waiting longer than 72 hours.
For the meantime, please have a look at our FAQ You may find the answer for your question right there!
Please choose a topic and subtopic from the list below, and be as specific as possible in the data you enter
Thank you for contacting us, will be replied within an hour, Please note that the working hours are from 9 am to 2 am
You should read carefully the following terms and conditions of reseller agreement before using our system to ensure maximum privacy and confidentiality with Bitaqaty Business :
All copy rights reserved to National Technology Group (NTG)
Bitaqaty Business is a registered trademark of NTG

Resellers may sell services and products provided by Bitaqaty Business at discount rates lists. All services featured on this website are available as per signed contracts with owners. Reproduction or republication of any included services is prohibited without prior consent of Bitaqaty Business. Bitaqaty Business is entitled to change available rates, according to market prices, without prior notification to distributor. Rates will be updated in the discounts and offers box within the reseller’s account page on Bitaqaty Business

Bitaqaty Business is committed to protecting user privacy. No reseller is entitled to disclose any private data included in his/her account to a third party, including Bitaqaty Business team or technical support team. In this case, Bitaqaty Business shall not be held liable for any repercussions thereof. Using your account on Bitaqaty Business means you have credit account on Bitaqaty Business.net. Accordingly, user account should include valid data to ensure password recovery in case it is lost or forgotten. Should invalid data be registered with, Bitaqaty Business shall not be committed to account loss or recovery. Essential data include the following: mobile number, email address, username and address. In case of any change in reseller’s data, the user shall be responsible for updating his/her account details on Bitaqaty Business. In case of any account abuse, Bitaqaty Business has the sole right to suspend user’s account without prior notification. Logging in to your Bitaqaty Business account should be only done through the following link: https://www.Bitaqaty Business.net. Bitaqaty Business will not bear responsibility for illegal logins to Bitaqaty Business accounts Inactive accounts will be handled in accordance with Bitaqaty Business policy in this regards.

Welcome to bitaqatybusiness.com Website “Bitaqaty Business”. Please read the following terms and conditions:

By accessing, registering and/or continuing to use or access the Website, you are agreeing to be bound by these Terms of Use and the other documents and terms with immediate effect.
These Terms of Use and the Legal Documents are subject to change by us at any time. Your continued use of the Website following any such change constitutes your agreement to these Terms of Use and Legal Documents as so modified.

ABOUT THE WEBSITE
The Website is an e-commerce platform that allows users to purchase a wide variety of cards and digital services.
BITAQATY BUSINESS reserves the right to introduce new services and update or withdraw any of the services, in our sole discretion without any liability.

Bitaqaty Business takes the privacy of your personal information very seriously, and by accepting this Privacy Policy, you expressly consent to us collecting, using and disclosing your personal information only in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Please note that Bitaqaty Business does not sell, rent or license your personal information to anyone.

string-array.name: more_faq_header_arr
string-array.item: How can I get Bitaqaty POS to sell vouchers?
How do I become an authorized Reseller?
What are the discount rates that I will get?
How do I contact Bitaqaty sales employee in my area?
If one of my clients or I face a problem redeeming a voucher, what should I do?
What is the reseller agreement? Is it necessary to sign the agreement to work with you?
If I have a request for a specific voucher and it is not available in your system, what should I do?
Can I get a tax invoice after purchasing vouchers from you?
In which countries are authorized resellers accepted currently?
Which banks do you have accounts with?
What are the payment methods available to recharge my reseller account?
If my POS device malfunctions, what should I do?

string-array.name: more_faq_body_arr
string-array.item: ○ Bitaqaty POS is available for all our authorized resellers in various countries of the Middle East region, kindly submit a request via the following page and a member of our sales team will contact you.
○ You can submit a request on the following page to be contacted by a member of our sales team to help you join our network of Resellers.
○ The discount rates vary depending on the type of product as well as on your average monthly sales as an authorized reseller.
○ You can contact our customer service through our website, and they will direct one of our employees to contact you as soon as possible.
○ You can contact Bitaqaty Business customer service and one of our representatives will assist you to redeem the voucher.

○ The reseller agreement is a simple legal document that clarifies the nature of the relationship between the Bitaqaty Business and their authorized Resellers and the obligations and rights of both parties.

○ We are constantly adding new vouchers and we always welcome suggestions from our partners, kindly inform the sales employee responsible for your account about the required service and we will work on adding it to our portfolio as soon as possible.

○ Yes, indeed, we are keen to comply with all local laws in all countries in which we operate.\nYou can contact the salesperson responsible for your account to request a tax invoice at the end of each calendar month.
○ Our network of authorized resellers is mainly in the Middle East region; however you can join our network of authorized resellers from any country around the world.

○ We have a network of accounts in various local banks in the countries in which we operate, kindly contact the salesperson responsible for your account and he will provide you with a list of our bank accounts according to your country.

○ We have different recharging methods according to the country in which your account is registered, such as Mada, Visa, MasterCard, PayPal and other methods; For more information, kindly refer to the recharging page inside your reseller account dashboard.
○ Kindly contact the salesperson responsible for your account immediately and he will assist you in solving the issue or replace the device if necessary.

string-array.name: more_terms_of_use_header_arr
string-array.item: 1. Client’s Obligations
2. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
3. WARRANTIES, REPRESENTATIONS & UNDERTAKINGS
4. LIABILITY & INDEMNITIES
5. REPORTING VIOLATIONS OF THESE TERMS OF USE
6. General Provisions

string-array.name: more_terms_of_use_body_arr
string-array.item:
When using or accessing the Services, you agree that you:
  • are responsible for maintaining the privacy of, and restricting access to and use of your account and password, and accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account and password.
  • agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security.
  • will provide true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself and your use of the services as required by us.
  • will cooperate with our requests for additional information with respect to your eligibility and usage of our services.
  • will not take any action that may undermine the Website’s feedback and ratings systems.
  • will not transfer your account to other party.
  • will not distribute viruses or any other technologies that may harm our services or the interests or property of other users.
  • will not infringe the copyright, trademark, patent, publicity, moral, database, and/or other intellectual property rights (collectively, "Intellectual Property Rights")that belong to or are licensed to us and any Intellectual Property Rights that belong to third parties.
  • will not harvest or otherwise collect information about users or circumvent any technical measures we use to provide the services.

• All content included on the Website, including but not limited to digital cards, text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, digital downloads and software is our property or the property of our licensors and suppliers. We (or our licensors or suppliers, as the case may be) retain all right, title and interest in and to the Website and the services, including without limitation, all Intellectual Property Rights therein.
  • You agree that you have no right to use any of our trademarks without our prior written consent.
  • You agree that you have no right to claim to be an agent, marketer or representative of Gulf Direct Distribution Company or “bitaqatybusiness.com”

You warrant, represent and undertake that:
  • you shall fully comply and will at all times continue to fully comply with all applicable laws, statutes and regulations, including without limitation, all privacy laws and content regulation.
  • you have full power and authority to enter into these Terms of Use and the execution and performance of your obligations under these Terms of Use does not conflict with:
     ○any laws, rules, regulations or governmental guidelines to which you are subject to.
     ○any other agreements to which you are a party to or to which you are otherwise bound by
  • if you create or use an account on behalf of a business entity, you represent that you are authorized to act on behalf of such business and bind the business to these Terms of Use. Such account is deemed to be owned and controlled by the business entity.
  • any content you submit as part of your use of the services and any products that you list do not violate the rights of any third party anywhere in the world including without limitation, any Intellectual Property Rights (whether registered or not).
  • services are provided to you on an “as is” basis without warranties, representations, or undertakings of any kind. We disclaim all warranties, representations, or undertakings of any kind, whether express, implied or collateral, including, but not limited to, all warranties, representations, or undertakings of merchantability, of fitness for a particular or general purpose, of non-infringement, of compatibility or that the services are secure or error free or will operate without interruption or will be provided in a timely or proper manner or at all.
  • furthermore, whilst we attempt to be as accurate as possible, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content of any Service is accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. Additionally, as a buyer, you agree that we are not responsible for examining or warranting the listings or content provided by us or third parties through the services, and that you will not attempt to hold us liable for any inaccuracies or defects in any of the listings.

• In no event will we, our parent company, subsidiaries and affiliates, and our, and their directors, officers, agents, employees or suppliers be liable, whether based on an action or claim in contract, tort, negligence, breach of statutory duty or otherwise arising out of or in relation to these Terms of Use for loss of profits, loss of data or information, business interruption or other pecuniary loss or for any special, indirect, incidental or consequential damages, even if we, our affiliates, directors, officers, agents, employees, licensors, subcontractors or suppliers have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
  • In addition, we (including our parent company, subsidiaries and affiliates and our, and their directors, officers, agents, employees or suppliers) are not liable, and you agree not to hold us responsible, for any damages or losses resulting directly or indirectly from:
     ○ the content or other information you provide when using the services.
     ○ your use of or your inability to use our services.
     ○ pricing, shipping, format or other guidance provided by us.
     ○ delays or disruptions in our services.
     ○ viruses or other malicious software obtained by accessing or linking to our services.
     ○ bugs, errors or inaccuracies of any kind in our services.
     ○ damage to your hardware device from the use of products sold on the Website or our services.
     ○ the content, actions or inactions of third parties using our services.
     ○ a suspension or other action taken by us with respect to your use of the services.
     ○ your need to modify practices, content or behavior or your loss of or inability to do business as a result of changes to these Terms of Use.
  • You agree to indemnify and hold us, our parent company, subsidiaries and affiliates and our, and their directors, officers, agents, employee or suppliers harmless from and against any losses, damages and expenses (including legal fees and attorney’s fees) (“Claims”) arising out of or relating to:
     ○any claims or demands made by any third party due to or arising out of your use of the services.
     ○your violation of any of the provisions of these Terms of Use, including without limitation, any of the warranties, representations and undertakings.
     ○ your violation of any applicable laws, including without limitation, data protection or anti-spam laws.
     ○the manner in which you use our services, including, without limitation, that the content you post, the items you list or your trademarks infringe the Intellectual Property Rights of any third party or that the content of your listings is slanderous, defamatory, obscene or violates any other rights (including privacy rights) of any third party (including other Website users).

We are committed to ensuring that listed items and content on our Website comply with these Terms of Use. If you believe that a listed item or content breaches these Terms of Use, please notify us and we will investigate.

• Governing Law: These Terms of Use and any non-contractual rights or obligations arising out of or in connection with it shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the applicable laws of Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA).
  • Dispute Resolution: If you have an issue with our services, please contact us. We will endeavor to resolve your issue as soon as possible. Any disputes or Claims arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use, including any non-contractual rights or obligations arising out of or in connection with these Terms of Use shall be referred to and finally resolved by Riyadh, KSA courts.
  • Relationship of the Parties: Nothing contained in these Terms of Use will be deemed or construed by the parties or any third party to create the relationship of partnership, joint venture or agency between the parties, it being understood that the parties will at all times remain independent parties contracting for services.
  • Further Assurances: The parties will do and execute or arrange for the doing and executing of each necessary act, document and thing reasonably within its power to implement and give effect to these Terms of Use to its full extent, including without limitation, assisting each other in complying with applicable law.
  • Entire Agreement: These Terms of Use and the documents referred to or incorporated herein by reference contain the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter and supersede all prior agreements, negotiations and representations, written or oral, relating to its subject matter. Except as provided in these Terms of Use and the documents referred to or incorporated into these Terms of Use by reference, there are no conditions, representations, warranties, undertakings or agreements between the parties whether direct, indirect, collateral, express or implied.
  • Amendment: We reserve the right to modify, vary, amend or supplement these Terms of Use at any time and from time to time. We will post the current version of these Terms of Use on the Site and each such change will be effective upon posting on the Site or upon the date designated by us as the “effective date” (if any). Your continued use of the services following any such change constitutes your agreement to be bound by and its acceptance of these Terms of Use as so modified.
  • Severability: If any provision of these Terms of Use is determined by any court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable, that provision will be severed from these Terms of Use and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect so long as the economic or legal substance of the transactions contemplated hereby is not affected in any manner.
  • Force Majeure: Neither party will be liable for any loss or damage or for any delay or failure in performance due to acts beyond the control of such party whether or not such acts could reasonably be anticipated (including acts of God, legislative, judicial or regulatory acts of any provincial or the federal government, court or regulatory authority, acts of any of our subcontractors or anythird partyproviders of goods or Services to us, labor disruptions, blackouts, embargoes).
  • No Waiver: Any waiver by us of any of the provisions of these Terms of Use will not constitute a waiver of any other provision (whether similar or not), nor will any such waiver constitute a continuing waiver of that particular provision, unless expressly provided by us in writing.
  • Communications: You may contact us through email support@bitaqatybusiness.com
  • Survival: All provisions that either expressly or by their nature survive, will survive suspension or termination of your membership of the Website.

string-array.name: more_privacy_policy_header_arr
string-array.item: Bitaqaty Business’ Collection of Personal Information
Personal Information we collect
Security procedures

string-array.name: more_privacy_policy_body_arr
string-array.item: To sign up for your Bitaqaty Business Account, we need to obtain certain personal information from you. You must complete Bitaqaty Business’ registration form accurately with correct information and might not provide any false or misleading information.

• Full Name, address, email, phone number and other information as required.
  • Financial information such as credit/debit card or bank account details for certain optional transactions.
  • For verification purposes, we might ask for a proof of your identity and proof of address; such as a copy of your national ID card, passport, driver’s license and/or certificate of registration
    PS: Failure to supply such information may result in limitation on usage of BitaqatyBusinessservices or suspension of the user’s Account. For certain high value transactions, we may be required to report personal information to the relevant authorities.

When your registration is completed, you may start using Bitaqaty Business’ services which are strictly protected against fraud and abuse through the following actions we take:
  • Recording and storing your IP address and login times.
  • Collecting usage and access data that allows us to prevent multiple account openings or other fraudulent behaviors, or to protect our systems against illegal attacks or abuse.
  • We may share such data with specialized and trustworthy fraud management services that help us analyze the data.
  • We use cookies; which are small text files that are stored on a user’s computer for record-keeping purposes. Information collected and stored through cookies may be matched against the personal data we hold on our systems.
  • Depending on the information you have provided us, your current verification status and the type of transaction you wish to undertake, we may collect further information from banks, credit/debit card processing services and identity verification services.
    We obtain your personal and security information from the following sources:
  • Information you provide online, on written applications or forms, and other information you may provide.
  • Information entered online that may be stored even if you do not complete or submit an application.
  • Information from third parties in order to verify your identity or to prevent fraud.
  • Information from third parties that you authorize to provide information to us.
  • Information about your account experience and history.

string-array.name: btrr_instruction_arr
string-array.item: First, transfer the amount from your bank account to business Bitaqaty account "Gulf Direct Distribution Company" before registering your transfer data on the Business Bitaqaty website.

After completing the transfer process, enter the transfer information, by following the required steps: Select the bank account which you transferred to, the sender’s details and the transfer details.
The E Payment department reviews your request and compares its data with your bank transfer data. The balance will be added when the data are identical.
Requests are processed within30 minutes 7days a week from 8:00 Am to 2:00 AM.
For request status, please check your registered email in Bitaqaty Business.
Minimum transfer amount is 500 SAR.
Maximum transfer amount is 50,000 SAR.
Maximum number of requests are 3 time within 24 hours.
Bank account and Bitaqaty Business account should have the same owner name.
Please keep the transfer receipt as it could be requested for verification.
We might call for verification, please make sure your mobile is available.

string-array.name: credit_mada_instruction_arr
string-array.item: Please follow the instructions
Minimum transfer amount is 100 SAR.
Maximum daily transfer total amount is 50,000 SAR.
Credit Card or Mada must be 3D Secure.
Copy of Credit Card (including first 6-digit number) and personal ID might be requested as verification.
Credit Card transactions can be accepted within MENA region only currently.
Processing fees could be added on credit card transactions.

string-array.name: amex_instruction_arr
string-array.item: The maximum limit per day is 20,000 SAR.
You can only do 10 American Express Card requests during 24 hours.
The value of an American Express Card recharge request must be between 500 SAR and 3,000 SAR.
Only 4% will be added to the recharged amount as a fee. And if your currency is not SAR the bank conversion rate will be applied.
Any attempt to charge by American Express card illegally, will close your account without reference to you and a reservation on any balance in your account.
Any objection to any American Express card transaction from the bank, will close your account and send all your data to the responsible.

resources.string: Amount after exchange and adding fees

Terms and conditions 


Terms and Conditions for the Use of the Option of Charging the Account through a Credit Card ("Terms of Use of the Charge Option"):

When the User chooses the option to charge his account through a Credit Card on www.bitaqatybusiness.com, he/she thereby acknowledges reading, comprehending and agreeing to the Terms of Use of the Charge Option, the Terms of Use, any other terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy available on the Website which govern the relationship between Bitaqaty Business and the User in relation to the Website (the “Terms and Conditions”) in full and agrees to abide by the Terms and Conditions in full without any reservation, condition or objection. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to update and/or amend the Terms of Use of the Charge Option, the Terms of Use, any other terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy available on the Website at any time and at its sole and absolute discretion without the need of the approval of the User and/or notifying him/her. Such update/amendment shall enter into effect immediately or at the time determined by Bitaqaty Business:

• The Use of this Option, any other option and/or any other services available on the Website (the “Services”) shall be at the full responsibility of the User and at its sole expense.


• The User shall be fully responsible for the use of the Services and/or any matters arising therefrom.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for what may arise from the use of the Services by the User whether in contract or otherwise in any manner whatsoever.


• The User represents, warrants and agrees that his/her use of the Services corresponds with all applicable legislation and that such use does not violate any of his/her obligations including his/her contractual obligations and otherwise with any other party including the bank that issued the card and acknowledges and agrees that he/she shall be fully responsible in case of breach of these representations and warranties.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in the event where the User uses the Services in violation to what is stated in the Terms and Conditions in any manner whatsoever. The User acknowledges and agrees that he/she shall be fully responsible in case of its non-abidance by the Terms and Conditions and fully, unconditionally and irrevocably indemnifies Bitaqaty Business against any responsibility and/or liability arising therefrom.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that logging into his account and conducting any transactions and/or use of any services on the Website shall be deemed to be by the User and that he/she shall be fully responsible accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in case of delay in charging the account of the User and/or any matter arising therefrom in any manner whatsoever.


• Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to reject the request to charge the account at its absolute discretion without stating any reason and without any responsibility and/or liability in any manner whatsoever.


• The charging transaction shall be final, unconditional and irrevocable for any reason whatsoever. The User shall not have the right for a reverse of the Transaction after its execution, a cash refund of the amount of the transaction and/or transfer of the amount from an account to another for any reason whatsoever including, but not limited to, for unavailability of an item and/or service and/or non-use of the amount available and shall not be entitled to claim accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever for the availability and/or unavailability of any item and/or service on the Website and/or any other website. The User shall not have the right to claim reverse of the Transaction, a cash refund of the amount of the Transaction and/or transfer of the amount from one account to another for the unavailability of the item and/or service and/or any other reason whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that it is fully aware of the means, procedures and other matters related to the Services available on the Website including purchase of items / services from the Website and the means of using same after purchase and/or other matters. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever of what arises from his/her breach of these representations.


• The agreement by the User to the Terms and Conditions including those related to the use of the credit card shall include its full responsibility for what arises from the use of the Credit card including the legal responsibility arising from any objection by the Issuing Bank and/or any other party in relation to the use of the Credit Card in the account of the User at Bitaqaty Business.


• In case of receipt by Bitaqaty Business of any objection from the Issuing Bank and/or any other party, Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to take any measures it deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion including, but not limited to, stoppage of the account of the User immediately or at the time Bitaqaty Business deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion and/or blockage of any amounts available in the account.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for any deficiency in the item / service purchased from the Website in any manner whatsoever. The User shall recourse to the technical support of the item/service provider and/or any responsible party in case of any deficiency in the item/service purchased from the website in case the User wishes so.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that due to the nature of the internet, Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible in case of stoppage and/or interruption of the Services and/or any other matters in any manner whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that it is fully aware that the internet is an international public network, thus use of the Services may entail various risks even though Bitaqaty Business uses security means and applications as it deems fit. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for any risks, damages and/or consequences arising therefrom in any matter whatsoever.
I have read and comprehended and hereby agree to the Terms and Conditions, and agree to abide by same without any reservation, condition or objection.

When the User chooses the option to charge his account through a Credit Card on www.bitaqatybusiness.com, he/she thereby acknowledges reading, comprehending and agreeing to the Terms of Use of the Charge Option, the Terms of Use, any other terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy available on the Website which govern the relationship between Bitaqaty Business and the User in relation to the Website (the “Terms and Conditions”) in full and agrees to abide by the Terms and Conditions in full without any reservation, condition or objection. Such update/amendment shall enter into effect immediately or at the time determined by Bitaqaty Business:

• The Use of this Option, any other option and/or any other services available on the Website (the "Services") shall be at the full responsibility of the User and at its sole expense.

• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in the event where the User uses the Services in violation to what is stated in the Terms and Conditions in any manner whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that he/she shall be fully responsible in case of its non-abidance by the Terms and Conditions and fully, unconditionally and irrevocably indemnifies Bitaqaty Business against any responsibility and/or liability arising therefrom.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that logging into his account and conducting any transactions and/or use of any services on the Website shall be deemed to be by the User and that he/she shall be fully responsible accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in case of delay in charging the account of the User and/or any matter arising therefrom in any manner whatsoever.


• Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to reject the request to charge the account at its absolute discretion without stating any reason and without any responsibility and/or liability in any manner whatsoever.


• The charging transaction shall be final, unconditional and irrevocable for any reason whatsoever. The User shall not have the right for a reverse of the Transaction after its execution, a cash refund of the amount of the transaction and/or transfer of the amount from an account to another for any reason whatsoever including, but not limited to, for unavailability of an item and/or service and/or non-use of the amount available and shall not be entitled to claim accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever for the availability and/or unavailability of any item and/or service on the Website and/or any other website. The User shall not have the right to claim reverse of the Transaction, a cash refund of the amount of the Transaction and/or transfer of the amount from one account to another for the unavailability of the item and/or service and/or any other reason whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that it is fully aware of the means, procedures and other matters related to the Services available on the Website including purchase of items / services from the Website and the means of using same after purchase and/or other matters. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever of what arises from his/her breach of these representations.


• The agreement by the User to the Terms and Conditions including those related to the use of the credit card shall include its full responsibility for what arises from the use of the Credit card including the legal responsibility arising from any objection by the Issuing Bank and/or any other party in relation to the use of the Credit Card in the account of the User at Bitaqaty Business.


• In case of receipt by Bitaqaty Business of any objection from the Issuing Bank and/or any other party, Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to take any measures it deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion including, but not limited to, stoppage of the account of the User immediately or at the time Bitaqaty Business deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion and/or blockage of any amounts available in the account.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for any deficiency in the item / service purchased from the Website in any manner whatsoever.


• The User shall recourse to the technical support of the item/service provider and/or any responsible party in case of any deficiency in the item/service purchased from the website in case the User wishes so.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that due to the nature of the internet, Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible in case of stoppage and/or interruption of the Services and/or any other matters in any manner whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that it is fully aware that the internet is an international public network, thus use of the Services may entail various risks even though Bitaqaty Business uses security means and applications as it deems fit. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for any risks, damages and/or consequences arising therefrom in any matter whatsoever.

Terms and conditions


 Terms and Conditions for the Use of the Option of Charging the Account through a American Express Card ("Terms of Use of the Charge Option"):

 When the User chooses the option to charge his account through a American Express card on www.bitaqatybusiness.com, he/she thereby acknowledges reading, comprehending and agreeing to the Terms of Use of the Charge Option, the Terms of Use, any other terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy available on the Website which govern the relationship between Bitaqaty Business and the User in relation to the Website (the "Terms and Conditions") in full and agrees to abide by the Terms and Conditions in full without any reservation, condition or objection. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to update and/or amend the Terms of Use of the Charge Option, the Terms of Use, any other terms and conditions and the Privacy Policy available on the Website at any time and at its sole and absolute discretion without the need of the approval of the User and/or notifying him/her. Such update/amendment shall enter into effect immediately or at the time determined by Bitaqaty Business:

• The Use of this Option, any other option and/or any other services available on the Website (the "Services") shall be at the full responsibility of the User and at its sole expense. The User shall be fully responsible for the use of the Services and/or any matters arising therefrom. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for what may arise from the use of the Services by the User whether in contract or otherwise in any manner whatsoever.

• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in the event where the User uses the Services in violation to what is stated in the Terms and Conditions in any manner whatsoever. The User acknowledges and agrees that he/she shall be fully responsible in case of its non-abidance by the Terms and Conditions and fully, unconditionally and irrevocably indemnifies Bitaqaty Business against any responsibility and/or liability arising therefrom.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that logging into his account and conducting any transactions and/or use of any services on the Website shall be deemed to be by the User and that he/she shall be fully responsible accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in case of delay in charging the account of the User and/or any matter arising therefrom in any manner whatsoever.


• Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to reject the request to charge the account at its absolute discretion without stating any reason and without any responsibility and/or liability in any manner whatsoever.


• The charging transaction shall be final, unconditional and irrevocable for any reason whatsoever. The User shall not have the right for a reverse of the Transaction after its execution, a cash refund of the amount of the transaction and/or transfer of the amount from an account to another for any reason whatsoever including, but not limited to, for unavailability of an item and/or service and/or non-use of the amount available and shall not be entitled to claim accordingly.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever for the availability and/or unavailability of any item and/or service on the Website and/or any other website. The User shall not have the right to claim reverse of the Transaction, a cash refund of the amount of the Transaction and/or transfer of the amount from one account to another for the unavailability of the item and/or service and/or any other reason whatsoever.


• The User acknowledges and agrees that it is fully aware of the means, procedures and other matters related to the Services available on the Website including purchase of items / services from the Website and the means of using same after purchase and/or other matters. The User acknowledges and agrees that Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable in any manner whatsoever of what arises from his/her breach of these representations.

• In case of receipt by Bitaqaty Business of any objection from the Issuing Bank and/or any other party, Bitaqaty Business shall have the right to take any measures it deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion including, but not limited to, stoppage of the account of the User immediately or at the time Bitaqaty Business deems fit at its sole and absolute discretion and/or blockage of any amounts available in the account.


• Bitaqaty Business shall not be responsible/liable for any deficiency in the item / service purchased from the Website in any manner whatsoever. Terms and conditions


• Only verified PayPal accounts will be accepted!


• Bitaqaty Business accepts accounts issued from the Middle East and North Africa only

string-array.name: paypal_arr
string-array.item: PayPal is a global e-commerce business allowing payments and money transfers to be made through the Internet.

How to add funds using PayPal:

- Login to your Bitaqaty Business account, then click ‘Recharge’.

- Choose “PayPal” from the listed recharging methods

- Choose card denomination, then click “Recharge” then Confirm.

- You will be redirected to PayPal page to sign in and confirm your transaction

Please note that: 

- Requests are processed within one hour from 8 AM to 2 AM / 7 days a week.

- Please note that we might ask you to provide us with scanned copies of your ID card, in order to complete your request. We might also need to call you for verification.
